caption: Relating to the creation, operation, and powers of the Texas Division of Homeland Security.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill establishes the Texas Division of Homeland Security, focusing on Texas-Mexico border security operations. While not explicitly targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects all foreign nationals through surveillance, detection, and interdiction of illegal entry. The division will conduct law enforcement operations, intelligence gathering, and coordinate with federal agencies for border security. Chinese individuals crossing the southern border would be subject to these enhanced security measures.

中文摘要：
该法案建立德克萨斯州国土安全部门，主要针对德克萨斯-墨西哥边境安全行动。虽然没有明确针对中国移民，但通过监视、侦查和拦截非法入境者，该法案会影响所有外国人。该部门将进行执法行动、情报收集，并与联邦机构协调边境安全工作。从南部边境入境的中国公民将受到这些加强的安全措施的影响。

Most likely committees:
1. Homeland Security & Public Safety Committee
2. State Affairs Committee
3. Border & International Affairs Committee
